mutants.mutated_line: return toBase(num // base, base) - convertString[num % base]
return toBase(num // base, base) * convertString[num % base]
return toBase(num / base, base) + convertString[num % base]
return toBase(num * base, base) + convertString[num % base]
return toBase(num // base, base) + convertString[num * base]
return toBase(num // base, base) + convertString[num + base]
